advisories.impact: Parsing a file may lead to an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

cves.credit: Noah Roskin-Frazee and Prof. J. (ZeroClicks.ai Lab)

advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to access private information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: An app may gain unauthorized access to Bluetooth
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: The issue was resolved by sanitizing logging

advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code as root from the Lock Screen
advisories.description: The issue was addressed by restricting options offered on a locked device.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause a denial-of-service to Endpoint Security clients
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Noah Roskin-Frazee and Prof. J. (ZeroClicks.ai Lab)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved handling of files.

advisories.impact: A website may be able to access sensitive user data when resolving symlinks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved handling of symlinks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

advisories.impact: Processing an image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to heap corruption
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An attacker that has already achieved kernel code execution may be able to bypass kernel memory mitigations
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

cves.credit: Thijs Alkemade (@xnyhps) from Computest Sector 7, Zhongquan Li (@Guluisacat), and Bohdan Stasiuk (@Bohdan_Stasiuk)

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted input may lead to arbitrary code execution in user-installed apps
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A malicious app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved handling of symlinks.

advisories.impact: An attacker with knowledge of a standard user's credentials can unlock another standard user's locked screen on the same Mac
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: An inconsistent user interface issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.
